entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -15.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -15.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -20.8°C
Wind: SSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm in the Natuashish area. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming north 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
